verses.text: And of the \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w cloths|strong="H0899"\w* of \w service|strong="H8278"\w*, to do \w service|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8438"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

And they did \w beat|strong="H7554"\w* the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w into|strong="H0854"\w* thin \w plates|strong="H6341"\w*, and \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \add it into\add* \w wires|strong="H6616"\w*, to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* in the \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and in the \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and in the \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and in the fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \add with\add* \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.

They \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w shoulderpieces|strong="H3802"\w* for it, to couple \add it\add* \w together|strong="H2266"\w*: by the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w edges|strong="H7098"\w* was it coupled \w together|strong="H2266"\w*.

And the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of his \w ephod|strong="H0642"\w*, that \add was\add* upon it, \add was\add* of the same, according to the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* thereof; \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And they \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w inclosed|strong="H4142"\w* in \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w graven|strong="H6605"\w*, as \w signets|strong="H2368"\w* are \w graven|strong="H6603"\w*, with the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them on the \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \add that they should be\add* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* \add of\add* \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, like the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*; \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

It was \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*; they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* \w double|strong="H3717"\w*: a \w span|strong="H2239"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w span|strong="H2239"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof, \add being\add* \w doubled|strong="H3717"\w*.

And they \w set|strong="H4390"\w* in it \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: \add the first\add* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \add was\add* a \w sardius|strong="H0124"\w*, a \w topaz|strong="H6357"\w*, and a \w carbuncle|strong="H1304"\w*: this \add was\add* the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w*.\f + \fr 39.10 \ft sardius: or, ruby\f*
And the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w*, an \w emerald|strong="H5306"\w*, a \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*, and a \w diamond|strong="H3095"\w*.
And the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w*, a \w ligure|strong="H3958"\w*, an \w agate|strong="H7618"\w*, and an \w amethyst|strong="H0306"\w*.

And the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w*, a \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, an \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w*, and a \w jasper|strong="H3471"\w*: \add they were\add* \w inclosed|strong="H4142"\w* in \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in their \w inclosings|strong="H4396"\w*.

And the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \add were\add* according to the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*, according to their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, \add like\add* the \w engravings|strong="H6603"\w* of a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, according to the \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* \w chains|strong="H8333"\w* at the \w ends|strong="H1383"\w*, \add of\add* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*; and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.

And they \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* wreathen \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* on the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* they \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them on the \w shoulderpieces|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H4136"\w*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*, upon the \w border|strong="H8193"\w* of it, which \add was\add* on the \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add other\add* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w underneath|strong="H4295"\w*, \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* the \w forepart|strong="H6440"\w* of it, over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \add other\add* \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* thereof, \w above|strong="H4605"\w* the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

And they did \w bind|strong="H7405"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* by his \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* unto the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* with a \w lace|strong="H6616"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, that it might be above the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and that the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* might not be \w loosed|strong="H2118"\w* from the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \add of\add* \w woven|strong="H0707"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, \w all|strong="H3632"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*.

And \add there was\add* an \w hole|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, as the \w hole|strong="H6310"\w* of an \w habergeon|strong="H8473"\w*, \add with\add* a \w band|strong="H8193"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w hole|strong="H6310"\w*, that it should not \w rend|strong="H7167"\w*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w hems|strong="H7757"\w* of the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, \add and\add* \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \add linen\add*.

And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w bells|strong="H6472"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w bells|strong="H6472"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* upon the \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* of the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* the \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*;

A \w bell|strong="H6472"\w* and a \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, a \w bell|strong="H6472"\w* and a \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* of the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \add in;\add* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w coats|strong="H3801"\w* \add of\add* fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* \add of\add* \w woven|strong="H0707"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and for his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*,

And a \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* \add of\add* fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w goodly|strong="H6287"\w* \w bonnets|strong="H4021"\w* \add of\add* fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w breeches|strong="H4370"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*,

And a \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, \add of\add* \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w plate|strong="H6731"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* upon it a \w writing|strong="H4385"\w*, \add like to\add* the \w engravings|strong="H6603"\w* of a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*, \w HOLINESS|strong="H6944"\w* TO THE \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \w tied|strong="H5414"\w* unto it a \w lace|strong="H6616"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, to \w fasten|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* on \w high|strong="H4605"\w* upon the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ Thus was all the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so \w did|strong="H6213"\w* they.

¶ And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and all his \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, his \w taches|strong="H7165"\w*, his \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*, his \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*, and his \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and his \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*,

And the \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w rams’|strong="H0352"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* dyed \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, and the \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* of \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* of the \w covering|strong="H4539"\w*,
The \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, and the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof, and the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*,
The \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and the \w shewbread|strong="H6440"\w*,

The \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w*, \add with\add* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof, \add even with\add* the \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* to be set in \w order|strong="H4634"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* thereof, and the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for \w light|strong="H3974"\w*,

And the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*,\f + \fr 39.38 \ft the sweet…: Heb. the incense of sweet spices\f*

The \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and his \w grate|strong="H4345"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, his \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*, and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*,

The \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, his \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and his \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, his \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*, and his \w pins|strong="H3489"\w*, and all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, for the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*,

The \w cloths|strong="H0899"\w* of \w service|strong="H8278"\w* to do \w service|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, and the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, to minister in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

According to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, so the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w work|strong="H5656"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* did \w look|strong="H7200"\w* upon \w all|strong="H3651"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, and, behold, they had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* it as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, even so had they \w done|strong="H6213"\w* it: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* them.
